Name: Martini with a Spot
Instructions: STIR gin and vermouth with ice and strain into chilled glass. Carefully POUR 'spot' of absinthe into centre of the drink.
Review: Absinthe adds bone-dry complexity to this otherwise Wet Martini.
History: Discovered in 2007 at Westbourne House, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Martini with a Spot contains 184 calories
